# openclaw-rust v1.6.6-edge

## Scope
- Edge track release artifact for v1.6.6.
- Includes all core capabilities plus edge-first profile defaults.

## Highlights
- runtime.profile support with edge default guidance.
- self-healing policy knobs + telemetry metadata (`profile`, `maxAttempts`, `backoffMs`).
- profile-aware TTS fallback behavior and offline recommendations.

## Artifacts
- openclaw-rust-edge-windows-x86_64.exe
- openclaw-rust-edge-v1.6.6-windows-x86_64.zip
- openclaw-rust-edge-ubuntu20.04-x86_64
- openclaw-rust-edge-v1.6.6-ubuntu20.04-x86_64.tar.gz
